Package com.sun.comm

Class Summary
Alias This class is used to faciliate alias wildcarding.
CommProperties  
LinuxDriver  
LinuxParallel  
LinuxSerial  
PathBundle Used to conglomerate valid physical ports device links (only) into a list containing File objects and descriptive information.
PlatformPortBundle  
PortmapDatabase Manages storage and look up of portmapping elements.
PortmapEntry These are the port map entries for the PortmapDatabase.
Portmapping This class is used to handle all portmapping for javax.comm.
SunrayInfo This class interfaces with the Sun Ray platform via native code.
Unix This class contains interfaces to the UNIX platform.
Util Utility methods for javax.comm
